Reviews.Title: “small, clean, functional”

Reviews.Content: double corner bedroom tiny hotel recently refurbished immaculately clean bathroom staff helpful cheerful location brilliant hotel simple clean handy location photos hotels website actually look

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Location”
Reviews.Author: csammut
Reviews.Content: hotel clean comfortable staff helpful indeed bfast hotel road theres beautiful cafe english bfast â‚¬10 dont expect makes hotel advantageous hotel youll stumble train station close red light dam square importantly train station return id surely stay friendly receptionist told theyre planning refurbishing hotel probably

Reviews.Title: “Great Location with clean comfortable rooms”
Reviews.Author: Laura01_11
Reviews.Content: hotel perfect nights stay amsterdam close train station airport restaurants coffeeshops souvenier shops walking distance bathroom remodeled clean rest average staff friendly helpful

Reviews.Title: “Definitly not 3 star”
Reviews.Author: Ivan_002_10
Reviews.Content: tiny bathrooms shower thin walls tv furniture air condition properly expensive 150 eur breakfast positive location near central station free internet hotels pictures internet nice true afford try decent hotel

Reviews.Title: “Not fancy but tolerable”
Reviews.Author: Paul0326
Reviews.Content: friend spent 2 nights people reception ignored time breakfast ok hardboiled eggs fried scrambled excellent bakeries street skip breakfast available 8 late start dark barren 4 naked light bulbs 15 watt source light bright read bathroom wifi service unit complained told thats sometime convenient location busy night weekends cleanliness ok hallway beat scratched walls paint job

Reviews.Title: “AVOID”
Reviews.Author: KerryNetherlands
Reviews.Content: extra bed set 3 adults sharing trip advisor reviews chance bed fell apart guest services left 103 complete nightmare stay

Reviews.Title: “Great location, great value, great staff, had a great time.”
Reviews.Author: Leightong
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights arriving train short walk station busy street hotel entrance own street smoker etc enter hotel straight hotel bar onto lifts rear found staff friendly ready chat help directions recommendations etc stayed 3rd floor pretty quiet clean functional bathroom shower excellent location means youre close stuff amsterdam mentioned paid â£60 night worth breakfast wasnt included extra 10 euro slept anyway bars mainly locals hotel left left sailor etc hotel amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “Great location but ...”
Reviews.Author: GregKo
Reviews.Content: strong hotel definitely location heart red light district 5 min walk central station staff friendly helpful avoid ground floor gloomy smelly top floors bigger value money breakfast included

Reviews.Title: “Good value”
Reviews.Author: morsva
Reviews.Content: hotel outside red light district busy street cars hotel nice quiet clean staff met friendly helped lot maps hair dryer water boiler iron reception close station

Reviews.Title: “Great little hotel for biz or pleasure”
Reviews.Author: Shaun321
Reviews.Content: superb location 2 mins dam sq buzzy street enter check bar nice 24 hours late drink simple functional clean aircon complain especially eur 50 night gta hotels highly recommended

Reviews.Title: “Good location, regular staff”
Reviews.Author: menonkuwait
Reviews.Content: location walking distance walking distance amsterdam centraal station surprised huge bed wasnt particularly happy view terrace building guys hotel floor maze lot hotel free internet couldnt connected signal extremely weak hotel staff usage single computer kept browsing machine slow served purpose

Reviews.Title: “Brilliant hotel, great value and service and situated in the perfect place...”
Reviews.Author: MarkFrater
Reviews.Content: stayed gents tripple 311 5 nights reading reviews little apprehensive staying oh wrong hotel perfect experience amsterdam reasons weed red lights tours etc cleanliness hotel clean neat times staff daily fresh towels etc placed day location probably hotel location 3min walk train station 5min walk busiest redlight district street seedy hubs etc clean neat perfect short stay service excellent staff helpful friendly times value hotels looked dodgy comparison shocked dodgy ones paying lesser positions map sleep quality youre amsterdam sleep try location amsterdam party city people wine dine sleep windows hotel provide bit sound insulation outside noise wee hours morning regardless safety hotel safe staff trust worthy stoned mind leave wallets laying walk streets single penny missing tho staff clean internet internet hotel pc connected net near reception busy free otherwise mere 1 euro 5min fooddrink 24 hours day reasonably priced serve snacks toasties etc travel alley safe storage bicycles highly recommend hire duration stay amsterdam own pace little physical strain walking kill eventually otherwise warned coffeeshops recommendations street coffeeshops personally liked hunters relaxing marine aquariums watch enjoying weed coffeeshop street music loud enjoy stoned greenhouse effect street sells weed little cramped music wasnt gem round corner cafebar called green light district awesome decor varied music nice volume level sell weed welcome buy weed elsewhere smoke buy coke coffee costs plenty options budget afford dine restaurants average budget 12 euro decent meal etc 56 euro incl drink weed cost 1012 euro gram 3 joints beer etc costs 4 euro drink cool drinks 250 euro hotel perfect pay hope review helped

Reviews.Title: “normal hotel, needs cleaning”
Reviews.Author: rk88
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights friend expecting worse actually hotel 1location close central station red light district 2 normal 3 feel safe 2 girls staff care friendly 4 price bad clean dead tired walking amsterdam day sleep 2 shower 3 forgot cell phone called time emailed rude didnt care 4 wireless internet signal lobby amsterdam fun stay affordable hotel

Reviews.Title: “Nice and central”
Reviews.Author: Mikes19
Reviews.Content: left looked reviews hotel little concerned expect firstly hotel situated 5 minutes walk central station street red light twin bit spotlessly clean ample supply hot water plenty clean towels staff friendly thoroughly recommed hotel looking close action friendly clean frills hotel

Reviews.Title: “Stay Elsewhere”
Reviews.Author: rdanecker
Reviews.Content: ground level overlooking alley pillows pile dirty linens piled outside shower size coffin bath towel threadbare tear pillow greeted shock anticipated eventually procured answer linen shortage due easter holiday staff looks internet photos conveniently located 60 euro wo breakfast failed close low expectations

Reviews.Title: “First time I've been scolded for asking for an extra blanket”
Reviews.Author: crimsynthesis
Reviews.Content: stayed summer friend visiting amsterdam positive location convenient minutes walk central station unfortunately ground floor walk greasy bar dim hallway clean reeked marijuana sanitizing wipes clean bathroom door flimsy lock honest didnt feel safe brusque staff scolded additional blanket front morning werent
